content:
Project Name
Client
Brief Description
Services
Procurement Analysis
Dental care chain
›
Built search functionality on top of procurement system 
to identify best supplier and alternate products to 
optimize procurement spend
›
Provided visibility into purchase behavior by practice, 
and insights into potential cost savings
Procurement Optimization, 
recommendation Engine
1
SUCCESS STORIES - SUMMARY

PROCUREMENT OPTIMIZATION FOR A DENTAL CARE CHAIN
SITUATION
▪
The third-party procurement platform used by the client did not provide appropriate visibility into product suppliers leading to more 
expensive procurement options being selected
▪
Merilytics partnered with the client to build an overlay on the procurement tool to clearly identify the best supplier and provide visibility 
into product purchases
▪
Built a high-level procurement spend tracker to facilitate regular monitoring and tracking of spend by practices
▪
Estimated cost savings by switching supplier of suggested products to preferred supplier (or best supplier based on the list price)
▪
Built a handy and easy to use search platform for Products to enable the procurement team to identify the best supplier/product, with the 
following features:
o
Displays best supplier for a product
o
Displays list of compatible products for searched product
o
Provides an option to choose between branded and private label products
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪
Enabled the client to identify the best supplier based on product requirements
▪
Enabled the client to generate automated reports for cost savings at various cuts to provide visibility to the regional teams
▪
Projected annual savings of CAD $2.6M on a total spend of CAD $29.5M ( ~ 9% ) based on historical purchases
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client is a rapidly expanding network of dental clinics in North America
2

APPROACH / METHODOLOGY FOR PROJECT DELIVERY
3
Data clean-up
▪
Check Product spend information
▪
Identify and resolve data issues
▪
Map products across suppliers using combination of 
various product parameters
▪
Set-up database for future mappings
▪
Organize spend at high-level across product categories
▪
Calculate product level spend at practice level
Map products across suppliers
Analyze spend
01
02
03
Build Product Search Platform on Tableau
3.1
Estimate Cost Savings
3.2
▪
Search Engine that shows the best supplier corresponding to 
a product
▪
Provides options for alternate products for optimizing spend
▪
Projected savings based on best supplier for each product by 
category and clinic level
▪
Projecting savings by switching all purchases to a single 
supplier

PRODUCT SEARCH OVERLAY BUILT ON TABLEAU
4
Compatible Products
Best Supplier for 
selected Product
Product search box

EFFECTIVE SUPPLIER COMPARISON FOR SIMILAR PRODUCTS
5

Supplier Selection
Five different suppliers can 
be selected to show 
estimated savings

Option is provided to filter list of 
products as per requirement

Supplier with Best Savings

selected for each product where
